member.summary: A script pre-compiler.

member.summary: Precompiles given script, returns false if the script wasn't changed.
member.param: The path to the original script file.
The contents of the script file.

member.summary: Specifies initialization priority.

member.summary: Value to sort by.

member.summary: Creates new instance

member.name: T:Yggdrasil.Scripting.IScript
member.summary: Implemented by classes in scripts that can be initialized on load.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.IScript.Init
member.summary: Called after the script is loaded.

member.name: T:Yggdrasil.Scripting.IPostInitScript
member.summary: Implemented by scripts that need to execute code after all scripts were initialized.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.IPostInitScript.OnPostInit
member.summary: Called after all scripts were initialized.

member.name: T:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader
member.summary: Loads and initializes .NET scripts.

member.name: P:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.LoadedCount
member.summary: Returns the amount of script classes that were successfully loaded and initialized.

member.name: P:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.FailCount
member.summary: Returns the amount of script classes that failed to initialize.

member.name: P:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.TotalCount
member.summary: Returns the amount of script classes that were to be loaded.

member.name: P:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.FileCount
member.summary: Returns the amount of files loaded.

member.name: P:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.LoadingExceptions
member.summary: A list of exceptions thrown while initializing the compiled scripts.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.#ctor(System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider)
member.summary: Creates new instance, using the given CodeDomProvider to compile scripts and no caching.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.#ctor(System.CodeDom.Compiler.CodeDomProvider,System.String)
member.summary: Creates new instance, using the given CodeDomProvider to compile scripts, caching the result in the given file.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.AddPrecompiler(Yggdrasil.Scripting.IPrecompiler)
member.summary: Adds precompiler to be used on load.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.LoadFromListFile(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Loads all files listed in the given file, using . If priority folders is set, the method tries to find them in those folders first, using the files from them first, in order, so files can be overriden from other folders.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.ReadScriptList(System.String,System.String[])
member.summary: Returns list of files listed in given file. If priority folders is set, the method tries to find them in those folders first, using the files from them first, in order, so files can be overriden from other folders.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.LoadFromList(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Loads all files in the given list.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.Reload
member.summary: Reloads all previously loaded scripts.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.Unload
member.summary: Unloads all scripts, disposing them and clearing the internal script lists. Does not clear script file list, reloading after this loads the previously loaded scripts.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.Clear
member.summary: Unloads all scripts and clears script file list. Unlike Unload, reloading after this doesn't actually load anything.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.Compile(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Creates new assembly, compiling the given files.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.ClearTempFiles
member.summary: Clears temp files created during compilation.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.InitAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Initializes all types in given assembly.

member.name: M:Yggdrasil.Scripting.ScriptLoader.GetScriptType(System.String)
member.summary: Returns loaded script type by name.
